SELECT PALLET_NO,PALLET_TYPE,PALLET_NAME, CASE USED_FLAG WHEN '1' THEN '可用' ELSE '不可用' END USED_FLAG, PALLET_WEIGHT,PRODUCT_GUID,LAST_PRODUCT_GUID,BINDING_TIME, CASE LOAD_STATUS WHEN 1 THEN '有载' WHEN 0 THEN '无载' ELSE '异常' END LOAD_STATUS, FACTORY,CREATION_DATE,CREATION_USER FROM PSB_PALLET T1
T1.PALLET_NO LIKE '%'||#where.PALLET_NO#||'%'
ORDER BY PALLET_NO
